name: I'm Home V:0.1
description:
The Prologue Of The Story, Your name is Peter and you just got done with work. While you were driving home, your wife texts you that shes left your house and is never coming back. When you get home you go inside...

CONTROLS:

WASD - Walk Around

Mouse - Look Around

To Read Notes Just Walk Up To Them.

To Stop Reading A Note Walk Away From It.

Have Fun!
